definition: State Council Information Office of the People's Republic of China, abbr. for 國務院新聞辦公室|国务院新闻办公室[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Xin1 wen2 Ban4 gong1 shi4]
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: The delegation pays the visit to China at the invitation of the Information Office of the State Council of China.
sentences.chinese: 代表團是應國新辦邀請來華訪問的。

sentences.english: Time to get 'real' on China's Internet .
sentences.chinese: 國新辦稱，現在的中國互聯網必須推行實名制。
